attributes.action: Classify Cannabis as a class A drug
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The government should send a clear message that Cannabis is a very dangerous drug. The more potent forms currently available are genetically modified (GM)and very little is known of the effects of GM drugs. In the future these modifications could give rise to highly dangerous side effects and place an unbearable burden on the system to provide mental health care.
